snippet: Films will be crackling with tension this fall and winter, as a number of high-profile pictures tackle tough and sometimes violent subject matter, some of it politically tinged.
abstract: Several upcoming films with Oscar potential tackle violent and controversial subjects.
lead_paragraph: Films will be crackling with tension this fall and winter, as a number of high-profile pictures tackle tough and sometimes violent subject matter, some of it politically tinged.

headline.seo: Fall Films Tackle Tough, Politically Tinged Subjects
headline.main: Fall Films: More Bitter Pills Than Popcorn
headline.print_headline: Fall Films: More Bitter Pills Than Popcorn
